The plot below shows the [Relative Difference Estimator] (https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Xj9N6IgNaLctMO2tlLgLnQV8QndfU9fo/view) (RelDS) applied to consecutive Nightly builds.
* Confidence intervals generated from 1000 Poisson bootstrap replicates
* 20% of client samples are utilized
